items.title: 6 of the biggest challenges facing Musk’s new political party
items.description: The richest man in the world says he has started “the America Party.” Turning it into a meaningful movement will be difficult.

items.title: Democrats step up efforts to woo military veterans ahead of midterms
items.description: The Democratic Party is pushing to field more veterans as candidates in hopes of appealing to skeptical voters.
